name: Chop Chop Princess!
description: Hand-crafted cartoon violence endless runner about princess adventures in Zephyr Kingdom
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 or Equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB of VRAM; NVIDIA GeForce GTX 500 Series / AMD Radeon HD 7000 Series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 460 MB available space
